text: The Garcia Brothers are a Los Angeles-based Latin jazz conjunto formed pianist Robert Garcia, bassist Raul Garcia, and Rudy Garcia on timbales.Scott Janow Afro-Cuban Jazz p.44 Their debut album Jazz con Sabor Latino (1994) was recorded as an octet with a horns section and singer Rolando Mendosa on conga. ==References== Category:American Latin musical groups Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles Category:Latin jazz ensembles
title: The Garcia Brothers (Los Angeles band)
